summary: A utility class that prepares configurations and inputs and runs comprehensive validation checks on the Pop2Piano model, covering encoder‑decoder interactions, past key‑value handling, attention masking, weight sharing, generation capabilities, FP16 forward passes, and language‑model label preparation.
business_intent: Provide automated testing infrastructure to verify the correctness, performance, and compatibility of the Pop2Piano model before deployment, reducing bugs and ensuring reliable behavior across various scenarios.
